name: Feed Me or Die
description:
Made for My First Gamejam: Winter 2018!

The team!

Spottedphyre - Co-Designer, Artist, Audio

Grinjr - Co-Designer, Programmer

Feed Me or Die is about the antics of the Pied Babbler chick. While in the midst of danger, the chick hops into the open and makes tons of noise prompting it's flock to feed it before a predator comes by. A dangerous but successful tactic.

Go here for the DevLog

Inspired by:

Natural Born Hustlers - Sex, Lies, and Dirty Tricks

"How to Blackmail your parents for Food" - Nature.com

Music Credits:
